name: Wizards Apprentice
description:
Wizard's Apprentice is a short Plattformer, where you try to master spells in order to collect the most coins possible. How many coins can you collect? 

Have fun playing!

This game was made as a student project by Matthias Voigt and Frederic Wendt at  Game Design / UE in the course Digital Content Creation Advanced supervised by Adrian Azadvaten.
